attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Deeply concerned as my colleagues FEEL AS STRONGLY AS MYSELF THAT THE MODEL OF CBT IS NOT EFFECTIVE OR SUITABLE FOR ALL CLIENTS WHO REQUIRE PSYCHOLOGICAL TREATMENT.PLEASE SUPPORT
THIS VIEW.THANK YOU.. MR O'CONNELL

rejection.details: The title of a petition should be a request for action, not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
